dct_description_sm: American Geographical Society of New York. Alternte title on verso: World distribution of Leprosy. Briesemeister elliptical equal-area projection. On upper right margin: Atlas of distribution of diseases - plate 7. Verso: Leprosaria shown on map. Selected bibliography by countries.
dct_publisher_sm: New York, NY : American Geographical Society, 1953.
